trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Slatington
There were no other sightings in Slatington on or around August 29th 2013
Summary: This was the second night in a week and found other cases through out PA It is on video. from me
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the 27th of august 2013 we saw a strange orange light floating in the sky that moved ever so smooth. It was a viberant orange that floated faster than a balloon but slower then a plane or a helicopter. This night waws 845 pm 4 witnesses. To night knowing this has been seen over several night through out pa we were waiting and watching with no luck. I got up to go inside and there it was I called next door witnesses out of their homes to witness. We watched the same orb for almost 5 min and it changed direction and zigzagged. we will be watching over the next couple nights.
